error.invalid_auth: Authentication failed. Your API key is invalid or CSRF protection is turned on, preventing authentication.
error.invalid_host: The provided URL is not a valid host.

data_description.api_key: The API key of the Overseerr instance.
data_description.url: The URL of the Overseerr instance.

connection_error.message: Error connecting to the Overseerr instance: {error}

create_issue.description: Creates a new issue in Overseerr for a specific media item.

config_entry_id.description: The Overseerr instance to create the issue in.
config_entry_id.name: Overseerr instance

issue_type.description: The type of issue being reported.
issue_type.name: Issue type

media_id.description: The TMDB ID of the media item.
media_id.name: Media ID

problem_episode.description: The episode number with the issue (for TV shows).
problem_episode.name: Problem episode

problem_season.description: The season number with the issue (for TV shows).
problem_season.name: Problem season

create_issue.name: Create issue

config_entry_id.description: The Overseerr instance containing the issue.
config_entry_id.name: Overseerr instance

issue_id.description: The ID of the issue to delete.
issue_id.name: Issue ID

get_issues.description: Retrieves a list of issues from Overseerr.

config_entry_id.description: The Overseerr instance to get issues from.
config_entry_id.name: Overseerr instance

requested_by.description: Filter the issues by the user ID that reported them.
requested_by.name: Reported by

sort_order.description: Sort the issues by added or modified date.
sort_order.name: Sort order

get_issues.name: Get issues

get_requests.description: Retrieves a list of media requests from Overseerr.

config_entry_id.description: The Overseerr instance to get requests from.
config_entry_id.name: Overseerr instance

requested_by.description: Filter the requests by the user ID that requested them.
requested_by.name: Requested by

sort_order.description: Sort the requests by added or modified date.
sort_order.name: Sort order

get_requests.name: Get requests

update_issue.description: Updates an existing issue in Overseerr.

config_entry_id.description: The Overseerr instance containing the issue.
config_entry_id.name: Overseerr instance

issue_id.description: The ID of the issue to update.
issue_id.name: Issue ID

issue_status.description: The new status for the issue.
issue_status.name: Status

message.description: Add a comment to the issue.
message.name: Comment
